mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, prod_id, prod_group_id, prod_group_name, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time from crm_prod_group where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into crm_prod_group(tenant_id, prod_id, prod_group_id, prod_group_name, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time) values (#{tenantId}, #{prodId}, #{prodGroupId}, #{prodGroupName}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime})

insert into crm_prod_group(tenant_id, prod_id, prod_group_id, prod_group_name, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.prodId}, #{entity.prodGroupId}, #{entity.prodGroupName}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime})

insert into crm_prod_group(tenant_id, prod_id, prod_group_id, prod_group_name, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.prodId}, #{entity.prodGroupId}, #{entity.prodGroupName}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime})
on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), prod_id = values(prod_id), prod_group_id = values(prod_group_id), prod_group_name = values(prod_group_name), remark = values(remark), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), last_modified_time = values(last_modified_time)
mapper.update:
update crm_prod_group
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
prod_id = #{prodId},
prod_group_id = #{prodGroupId},
prod_group_name = #{prodGroupName},
remark = #{remark},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime},
where id = #{id}
